descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a dark red shape and a blue shape.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same width and half the height of the input grid, for example 3x3 if the input is twice that tall.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... copy only the top half of the input grid with dark red squares.When that is done, turn the black squares into light red. Then turn the dark red squares to black.The output grid is essentially the black areas of the top half of the input grid colored in light red.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a 3x6 grid with a red pattern and a blue pattern.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...place the red pattern in the grid with its top blocks touching the top of the grid. Then place the blue pattern on the grid with its bottom blocks touching the bottom of the grid (they may overlap in areas). Paint the uncovered (black) blocks orange, then finally paint all the red and blue blocks black.
